dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Liquid nitrogen is the liquefied form of the element nitrogen that's produced commercially by the fractional distillation of liquid air. It consists of two nitrogen atoms sharing covalent bonds (N 2). It is a colourless, odourless, tasteless gas that is the most plentiful element in Earth's atmosphere and is a constituent of all living matter. It freezes almost instantly and is incredibly cold. It is used in various applications including food packaging and cryogenic applications.

Liquid nitrogen is the liquefied form of the element nitrogen that's produced commercially by the fractional distillation of liquid air. It consists of two nitrogen atoms sharing covalent bonds (N 2). It is a colourless, odourless, tasteless gas that is the most plentiful element in Earth's atmosphere and is a constituent of all living matter. It freezes almost instantly and is incredibly cold. It is used in various applications including food packaging and cryogenic applications.
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 液氮是氮气的液态形式，温度非常低，约为零下196摄氏度。它在许多工业和科学应用中被用作制冷剂，例如在冷冻食品和生物样品保存中。

Liquid nitrogen is the liquid form of nitrogen, with a very low temperature around -196 degrees Celsius. It is used as a coolant in many industrial and scientific applications, such as in freezing food and preserving biological samples.
